Class ControlCentreAndWatchingStand

  • java.lang.Object
    • MonitorProxy
      • ControlCentreAndWatchingStand

  • public class ControlCentreAndWatchingStand
extends MonitorProxy
    The ControlCentreAndWatchingStand class is a monitor that contains necessary methods to be used in mutual exclusive access by the Broker, Spectators and Horses.

    This is where the Broker mostly operates and the Spectators watch the race.

    Since:
    2018-03-21
    See Also:
    Spectator
